subject: affiliate
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Marketing Team, I am one of your affiliate partners. I
currently have a commission of $16  is now due for payment. I would like to
kindly ask when the payment will be processed. Looking forward to your
response. Thank you very much in advance!

[image: Mailsuite] Email tracked with Mailsuite  ·  Opt out
<https://u.list-prefs.com/en/privacy/opt-out/unsubscribe/14fc521ca57c77eb2200e99cf5643cad55cf9cde/6cd18fea25da7cfe98d44bca2ed58bd17d1c571711434da59f67130a196ec17e76f8d32ed8c0af73044d63c3a850d921718e63cc1156d1876919c7268328e10b>
12:25:05 16/12/25

conversations.body_text: Hi fungus snow,     We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please note that our payment threshold is $60.

Hello, thank you for your response. As I previously discussed with your
company, I currently have personal matters to attend to, so I am unable to
continue promoting your products. Therefore, I would appreciate your
company's assistance in resolving the payment issue. Thank you and best
regards.
